In this training you shall learn how to bleed the system in a correct way.
Priming of the fuel system on engines equipped with manual hand pumps is only necessary when the whole fuel system has been drained.
When bleeding the fuel system it is important to take care of the environmental issue as well, the used fuel must be disposed in an proper way.
Up to 250 strokes at the hand pump (D7E)

Environmental issue
Bleeding the fuel system
Take care of old fuel in correct way

This training teaches the participants how they should follow the document "23003-3 Fuel system, bleeding".
In this training the participants shall learn how to bleed the system in a correct way. It is very important that they learn to bleed in a correct way, beacuse there are different ways to bleed comparing for example FE and FH.
During the practical training you can use this operation to test of the participant's skills.
Follow the order in the document for bleeding and be very strict.
